>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/workspaces/{workspaceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the details of the workspace identified by the given `workspaceId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgId","in":"path","description":"Organization numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"x-speakeasy-param-optional":true},{"name":"workspaceId","in":"path","description":"Optional workspace numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"x-speakeasy-name-override":"id"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"workspace":{"required":["fullName","name","visibility"],"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","nullable":true,"x-speakeasy-param-optional":true},"name":{"maxLength":40,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z\\d](?:[a-zA-Z\\d]|[-_](?=[a-zA-Z\\d])){1,38}$","type":"string","x-speakeasy-param-readonly":false},"fullName":{"maxLength":100,"type":"string","x-speakeasy-param-readonly":false},"description":{"maxLength":1000,"type":"string","x-speakeasy-param-readonly":false},"visibility":{"type":"string","enum":["PRIVATE","SHARED"],"x-speakeasy-param-optional":false,"title":"Visibility","x-speakeasy-param-readonly":false},"dateCreated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"lastUpdated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"x-speakeasy-entity":"Workspace","title":"Workspace"}},"title":"DescribeWorkspaceResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["message"],"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Operation not allowed"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
